analysis.description:
Reentrancy in BitGuildTrade.sellCards (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#480-535):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(cards.getGameStarted()) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#480-481)
	- existing = cards.getOwnedCount(msg.sender,_unitId) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#481-482)
	- (schemaUnitId,coinCost,None,sellable) = schema.getBattleCardInfo(_unitId,existing,_amount) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#488-491)
	- ethCost = SafeMath.mul(schema.unitBattlePLATCost(_unitId),_amount) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#491)
	- (schemaUnitId,coinProduction,coinCost,None,sellable) = schema.getCardInfo(_unitId,existing,_amount) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#492-496)
	- ethCost = SafeMath.mul(schema.unitPLATCost(_unitId),_amount) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#496-498)
	- coinChange = SafeMath.add(cards.balanceOfUnclaimed(msg.sender),SafeMath.div(SafeMath.mul(coinCost,70),100)) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#502-504)
	- coinChange = cards.balanceOfUnclaimed(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#505-508)
	- cards.setLastJadeSaveTime(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#508-509)
	- cards.setRoughSupply(coinChange) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#509)
	- cards.setJadeCoin(msg.sender,coinChange,true) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#509-512)
	- decreaseCoin = cards.getUnitsInProduction(msg.sender,_unitId,_amount) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#512-514)
	- cards.reducePlayersJadeProduction(msg.sender,decreaseCoin) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#515)
	- cards.setUintCoinProduction(msg.sender,_unitId,decreaseCoin,false) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#518-521)
	- cards.setCoinBalance(msg.sender,SafeMath.div(SafeMath.mul(ethCost,70),100),1,true) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#523-524)
	- cards.setOwnedCount(msg.sender,_unitId,_amount,false) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#524-527)
	- cards.setUintsOwnerCount(msg.sender,_amount,false) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#528-529)
	State variables written after the call(s):

BitGuildTrade.kill (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#190-194) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenContract.transferFrom(this,msg.sender,tokenContract.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#192-193)

BitGuildTrade.withdrawEtherFromTrade (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#535-546) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenContract.transfer(msg.sender,amount) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#545-546)

BitGuildTrade.withdrawToken (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#548-558) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenContract.transfer(msg.sender,amount) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#558)

Reentrancy in BitGuildTrade.buyPLATCards (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#289-349):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(cards.getGameStarted()) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#290)
	- existing = cards.getOwnedCount(_player,_cardId) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#293-297)
	- require(bool)(total <= cards.getMaxCap(msg.sender,_cardId)) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#299-300)
	- coinProduction = schema.unitCoinProduction(_cardId) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#302-303)
	- coinCost = schema.getCostForCards(_cardId,existing,_amount) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#303-306)
	- ethCost = SafeMath.mul(schema.unitPLATCost(_cardId),_amount) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#306-307)
	- coinCost = schema.getCostForBattleCards(_cardId,existing,_amount) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#308-311)
	- ethCost = SafeMath.mul(schema.unitBattlePLATCost(_cardId),_amount) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#311-313)
	- require(bool)(SafeMath.add(cards.coinBalanceOf(_player,1),_platValue) >= ethCost) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#314-316)
	- require(bool)(cards.balanceOf(_player) >= coinCost) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#316-317)
	- cards.updatePlayersCoinByPurchase(_player,coinCost) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#317-320)
	- cards.setCoinBalance(_player,SafeMath.sub(ethCost,_platValue),1,false) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#321)
	- cards.setCoinBalance(_player,SafeMath.sub(_platValue,ethCost),1,true) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#324-325)
	- cards.setTotalEtherPool(uint256(SafeMath.div(ethCost,4)),1,true) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#326-327)
	- cards.setCoinBalance(owner,devFund,1,true) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#329-330)
	- cards.increasePlayersJadeProduction(_player,cards.getUnitsProduction(_player,_cardId,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#332-334)
	- cards.setUintCoinProduction(_player,_cardId,cards.getUnitsProduction(_player,_cardId,_amount),true) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#334-336)
	- cards.AddPlayers(_player) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#339-340)
	- cards.setUintsOwnerCount(_player,_amount,true) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#340-341)
	- cards.setOwnedCount(_player,_cardId,_amount,true) (/unique_chucks/8/0x21598cebb98796f2746bcca0704b4a8d89b70e62.sol#341-343)
